code: import{CONSTANTS}from"../actions";export var addCard=function addCard(listId,text,text_opis){return{type:CONSTANTS.ADD_CARD,payload:{text_opis:text_opis,text:text,listId:listId}};};export var editCard=function editCard(cardId,text,text_opis,listId){return{type:CONSTANTS.EDIT_CARD,payload:{text_opis:text_opis,text:text,cardId:cardId,listId:listId}};};export var deleteCard=function deleteCard(listId,cardId){return{type:CONSTANTS.KILL_CARD,payload:{listId:listId,cardId:cardId}};};
